ygData.subject: I remember...
ygData.msgSnippet: I remember when I first heard of everquest, it was back in washington, (State) I was looking in the comp. usa add paper, I saw something called Everquest So
ygData.messageBody:
I remember when I first heard of everquest, it
was back in washington, (State) I was looking in the
comp. usa add paper, I saw something called "Everquest"
So I decided to check it out, when I got there I
though it was just another game, or chat, ya know, I'm
crazy about chats, but I was wrong, I think I went to a
computer which told you about the programs and I selected
EverQuest, it showed me a mini movie and I immediately
wanted that, I started reading the Faq about it, I
didn't finish it of course, and in summer I was
mensioning EverQuest all the time, it was about august, so
my mom said to wait 'till christmas, I never talked
about it, I just kept on doing my thing, Oddworld, Grim
Fandango, Chat, etc. I started realizing its kinda close
(Few months away) 'till Christmas and I wrote on my
calender the days 'till christmas, aproximatly today its
88 day's 'till it, I wrote some wish lists, at the
top was EverQuest & a 3D card, and below were other
stuff I could live without (I can live without
everquest but what would I do??????????) I'm a computer
geek, I love the computer, I try to stay on as long as
I can, ya know, last week I was sooooooooooo
restless, staying up 'till 11:00 at night, just bulding
stuff with legos, I've already chosen which races I
probaly want to be (Halfling, DarkElf, HighElf) I know
you can have 8. And I've chosen the names for them
(Petit, Dimness, Xyla) I even built little lego statues
of them, lol, so I really have gone completely mad
about everquest, Ever since it came out I've wanted it,
I promised my mom & dad that I will pay for the
monthly fees (atleast the first one is FREE) which is
9.89 per month? which I get 20.00 a month from my
chores :) and so I'm just sitting here... In front of my
computer, Programming, Chatting,
whatever.<br>:)<br><br>--Destino88
